content:
But I can already crumble ore just by touching it,
I wonder if there's even any point in making a mattock.
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持斧子闲聊（日常）-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
Is that mattock in your hands,
the legendary "Super Ultra Lightning Spin Mattock of Ultimate Sharpness"
that you made yourself? That's amazing!
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持斧子闲聊（日常）-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
"A mattock in <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>'s hands can generate a force of 500<ruby:N>N</ruby>!"
I think Dr. Moss is right.
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持斧子闲聊（日常）-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
Although Glenn told me
I could learn how to make a mattock from a DIY Card,
and find the rest of the materials just by picking up trash.
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持斧子闲聊（日常）-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
Your mattock is so cool! I wanted to make one too,
but after careful and thorough consideration,
<size=30>and after checking my bank balance—</size>
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持斧子闲聊（日常）-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content: I found out there was no need for me to do it.
